Package ch.leica.sdk.ErrorHandling

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorDefinitions
    Codes and messages for all the known errors the application can handle
    ErrorObject
    Contains a specific error with an error code and an error message.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeviceException
    Device answers with an error code
    IllegalArgumentCheckedException
    An Invalid argument has been found, such as: bad formatted command, ...
    NullAssignmentException
    A null value is tried to be assigned or modified
    PermissionException
    The APP do not have the corresponding permissions to execute, such as access to the GPS
    UpdateException
    Received or selected data is wrong
    WrongDataException
    Received or selected data is wrong
